parse:
run Pos1 {
    some disj U1 : User | some disj P1,P2 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = U1
        Influencer = none
        Photo = P1 + P2
        Ad = P1
        Day = D1 + D2
        follows = none
        posts = U1->P1 + U1->P2
        sees = U1->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2
    }
} for 1 User, 2 Photo, 2 Day expect 1

run Pos2 {
    some disj U1,U2 : User | some disj P1,P2 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = U1 + U2
        Influencer = U2
        Photo = P1 + P2
        Ad = P1
        Day = D1 + D2
        follows = U1->U2
        posts = U2->P1 + U2->P2
        sees = U1->P1 + U1->P2 + U2->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2
    }
} for 2 User, 2 Photo, 2 Day expect 1

run Pos3 {
    some disj U1,U2,U3 : User | some disj P1,P2,P3,P4 : Photo | some disj D1,D2,D3 : Day {
        User = U1 + U2 + U3
        Influencer = U3
        Photo = P1 + P2 + P3 + P4
        Ad = P1 + P4
        Day = D1 + D2 + D3
        follows = U1->U2 + U2->U3
        posts = U1->P1 + U2->P2 + U3->P3 + U3->P4
        sees = U1->P1 + U1->P4 + U2->P1 + U2->P4 + U3->P1 + U3->P4 + U1->P2 + U2->P3
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2 + P3->D2 + P4->D3
    }
} for 3 User, 4 Photo, 3 Day expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj U1,U2 : User | some disj P1 : Photo | some disj D1 : Day {
        User = U1 + U2
        Influencer = none
        Photo = P1
        Ad = P1
        Day = D1
        follows = none
        posts = U2->P1
        sees = U2->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj U1,U2 : User | some disj P1 : Photo | some disj D1 : Day {
        User = U1 + U2
        Influencer = U1
        Photo = P1
        Ad = none
        Day = D1
        follows = none
        posts = U2->P1
        sees = U1->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run Neg3 {
    some disj U1 : User | some disj P1,P2 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = U1
        Influencer = none
        Photo = P1 + P2
        Ad = P2
        Day = D1 + D2
        follows = none
        posts = U1->P1 + U1->P2
        sees = U1->P1 + U1->P2
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2
    }
} for 1 User, 2 Photo, 2 Day expect 0

run Pos1 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1 : Worker | some disj P1 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2

        Worker = W1
        Human = W1
        Robot = none

        Product = P1
        Material = P1
        Component = none
        Dangerous = none

        workers = WS1->W1
        succ = WS1->WS2
        parts = none
        workstation = none
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 1 Worker, 1 Product expect 1

run Pos2 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2 : Worker | some disj P1 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2

        Worker = W1 + W2
        Human = W1
        Robot = W2

        Product = P1
        Material = none
        Component = P1
        Dangerous = P1

        workers = WS1->W1 + WS2->W2
        succ = WS1->WS2
        parts = none
        workstation = P1->WS2
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 1 Product expect 1

run Pos3 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2, W3 : Worker | some disj P1 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2

        Worker = W1 + W2 + W3
        Human = W1 + W2
        Robot = W3

        Product = P1
        Material = P1
        Component = none
        Dangerous = none

        workers = WS1->W1 + WS1->W2 + WS2->W3
        succ = WS1->WS2 + WS2->WS1
        parts = none
        workstation = none
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 3 Worker, 1 Product expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1 : Worker | some disj P1 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2

        Worker = W1
        Human = none
        Robot = none

        Product = P1
        Material = P1
        Component = none
        Dangerous = none

        workers = none
        succ = WS1->WS2
        parts = none
        workstation = none
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 1 Worker, 1 Product expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2 : Worker | some disj P1 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2

        Worker = W1 + W2
        Human = W1
        Robot = none

        Product = P1
        Material = none
        Component = P1
        Dangerous = none

        workers = WS1->W1 + WS2->W2
        succ = WS1->WS2
        parts = none
        workstation = P1->WS1
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 1 Product expect 0

run Neg3 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2, W3 : Worker | some disj P1 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2

        Worker = W1 + W2 + W3
        Human = W1
        Robot = W2

        Product = P1
        Material = P1
        Component = none
        Dangerous = none

        workers = WS1->W1 + WS2->W2 + WS2->W3
        succ = WS1->WS2
        parts = none
        workstation = none
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 3 Worker, 1 Product expect 0

valid:
run Pos3 {
    // Positive: two components as parts of each other (no self-parts); humans and robots on separate workstations
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj WK1, WK2 : Worker | some disj PR1, PR2 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2
        Worker = WK1 + WK2
        Human = WK1
        Robot = WK2
        workers = WS1->WK1 + WS2->WK2
        succ = none->none
        Product = PR1 + PR2
        Material = none
        Component = PR1 + PR2
        Dangerous = none
        parts = PR1->PR2 + PR2->PR1
        workstation = PR1->WS1 + PR2->WS2
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 2 Product expect 1

consistent:
run Neg1 {
  some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2 : Worker | some disj P1, P2 : Product {
    // Signature contents
    Workstation = WS1 + WS2
    begin = WS1
    end = WS2
    Worker = W1 + W2
    Human = W1 + W2
    Robot = none
    Product = P1 + P2
    Component = P1
    Material = P2
    Dangerous = P1              // Component is dangerous (its part is not)

    // Fields
    workers = WS1->W1 + WS2->W2 // Both workstations are human-only
    succ = none->none
    parts = P1->P2
    workstation = P1->WS1       // Dangerous component assembled at human-only WS1

    // Other requirements (all satisfied by the above equalities)
    Worker = Human + Robot
    all ws: Workstation | some workers[ws]
    all w: Worker | one ws: Workstation | w in workers[ws]
    all c: Component | one c.workstation
    all c: Component | some parts[c]
    all m: Material | no parts[m]
    all ws: Workstation | (no (workers[ws] & Human)) or (no (workers[ws] & Robot))
    all c: Component | c not in parts[c]
    all c: Component | (some (parts[c] & Dangerous)) implies (c in Dangerous)

    // Main requirement (contradicted by the instance above)
    all c: Component | (c in Dangerous) implies no (workers[c.workstation] & Human)
  }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 2 Product expect 0

run Neg2 {
  some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2 : Worker | some disj P1, P2 : Product {
    // Signature contents
    Workstation = WS1 + WS2
    begin = WS1
    end = WS2
    Worker = W1 + W2
    Human = W1
    Robot = W2
    Product = P1 + P2
    Component = P1
    Material = P2
    Dangerous = P1              // Component is dangerous (its part is not)

    // Fields
    workers = WS1->W1 + WS2->W2 // WS1 human-only, WS2 robot-only
    succ = none->none
    parts = P1->P2
    workstation = P1->WS1       // Dangerous component assembled at human-only WS1

    // Other requirements (all satisfied)
    Worker = Human + Robot
    all ws: Workstation | some workers[ws]
    all w: Worker | one ws: Workstation | w in workers[ws]
    all c: Component | one c.workstation
    all c: Component | some parts[c]
    all m: Material | no parts[m]
    all ws: Workstation | (no (workers[ws] & Human)) or (no (workers[ws] & Robot))
    all c: Component | c not in parts[c]
    all c: Component | (some (parts[c] & Dangerous)) implies (c in Dangerous)

    // Main requirement (contradicted by the instance above)
    all c: Component | (c in Dangerous) implies no (workers[c.workstation] & Human)
  }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 2 Product expect 0

run Neg3 {
  some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W1, W2 : Worker | some disj P1, P2 : Product {
    // Signature contents
    Workstation = WS1 + WS2
    begin = WS1
    end = WS2
    Worker = W1 + W2
    Human = W1 + W2
    Robot = none
    Product = P1 + P2
    Component = P1
    Material = P2
    Dangerous = P1 + P2         // Dangerous part makes the component dangerous

    // Fields
    workers = WS1->W1 + WS2->W2 // Both workstations are human-only
    succ = none->none
    parts = P1->P2
    workstation = P1->WS1       // Dangerous component assembled at human-only WS1

    // Other requirements (all satisfied)
    Worker = Human + Robot
    all ws: Workstation | some workers[ws]
    all w: Worker | one ws: Workstation | w in workers[ws]
    all c: Component | one c.workstation
    all c: Component | some parts[c]
    all m: Material | no parts[m]
    all ws: Workstation | (no (workers[ws] & Human)) or (no (workers[ws] & Robot))
    all c: Component | c not in parts[c]
    all c: Component | (some (parts[c] & Dangerous)) implies (c in Dangerous)

    // Main requirement (contradicted by the instance above)
    all c: Component | (c in Dangerous) implies no (workers[c.workstation] & Human)
  }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 2 Product expect 0

previous:
run Neg3 {
    some disj Wb, We : Workstation |
    some disj R1, R2 : Robot |
    some disj M1 : Material |
    some disj C1, C2 : Component {
        Workstation = Wb + We
        begin = Wb
        end = We
        succ = Wb->We

        Worker = R1 + R2
        Human = none
        Robot = R1 + R2
        workers = Wb->R1 + We->R2

        Product = M1 + C1 + C2
        Material = M1
        Component = C1 + C2
        parts = C1->C2 + C2->C1
        workstation = C1->Wb + C2->We
        Dangerous = none

        // Negative: C1 and C2 are parts of each other, requiring each to be assembled before the other, which is impossible on the linear chain Wb->We; thus the requirement is violated.
        // Other requirements are satisfied (each station staffed, robots only and not mixed with humans, each worker at one station, each component at one station, components have parts, materials none, no self-parts, no dangerous items, single line begin->end).
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 3 Product expect 0

parse:
run Neg1 {
    some disj P1,P2 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2
        Course = C1
        Project = none
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = none
        enrolled = P2->C1
        Person <: projects = none->none

        Course <: projects = none->none
        Course <: grades = none->none->none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 0 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg3 {
    some disj P1 : Person | some disj C1,C2 : Course | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1
        Professor = none
        Student = P1
        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = none
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = none
        enrolled = none
        Person <: projects = none->none

        Course <: projects = none->none
        Course <: grades = none->none->none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 1 Person, 2 Course, 0 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Pos1 {
    some disj P,S : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + S
        Professor = P
        Student = S
        Course = C
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P->C
        enrolled = S->C

        Person <: projects = S->PR
        Course <: projects = C->PR

        grades = none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Pos2 {
    some disj P,S : Person | some disj C1,C2 : Course | some disj PR1,PR2 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + S
        Professor = P
        Student = S
        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = PR1 + PR2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P->C1 + P->C2
        enrolled = S->C1 + S->C2

        Person <: projects = S->PR1 + S->PR2
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1 + C2->PR2

        grades = none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 2 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Pos3 {
    some disj P,Q,S : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + Q + S
        Professor = P + Q
        Student = S
        Course = C
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P->C + Q->C
        enrolled = S->C

        Person <: projects = S->PR
        Course <: projects = C->PR

        grades = none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 3 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj P,Q,S : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + Q + S
        Professor = P + Q
        Student = S + Q
        Course = C
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P->C
        enrolled = S->C + Q->C

        Person <: projects = S->PR
        Course <: projects = C->PR

        grades = none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 3 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj P,Q,S : Person | some disj C1,C2 : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + Q + S
        Professor = P + Q
        Student = S + Q
        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P->C1 + P->C2
        enrolled = S->C1 + Q->C2

        Person <: projects = S->PR
        Course <: projects = C1->PR

        grades = none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 3 Person, 2 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg3 {
    some disj P,Q : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + Q
        Professor = P + Q
        Student = P
        Course = C
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = Q->C
        enrolled = P->C

        Person <: projects = P->PR
        Course <: projects = C->PR

        grades = none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

consistent:
run Neg1 {
    some disj P1,P2,P3 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj PR1 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        -- Universe
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2 + P3
        Course = C1
        Project = PR1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        -- Relations
        teaches = P1->C1
        enrolled = P3->C1
        Person <: projects = P3->PR1
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1
        Course <: grades = C1->P2->G1    -- P2 graded in C1 without being enrolled (violation)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2

        -- Requirements:
        all p: Person | some p.enrolled implies p in Student
        all p: Person | some p.teaches implies p in Professor
        all c: Course | some teaches.c
        all pr: Project | one (Course <: projects).pr
        all p: Person | some p.(Person <: projects) implies p in Student
        all pr: Project | some (Person <: projects).pr
        all s: Student, pr: Project | (s->pr in (Person <: projects)) implies (some c: Course | c->pr in (Course <: projects) and s->c in enrolled)
        all s: Student, c: Course | lone ( s.(Person <: projects) & c.(Course <: projects) )
        all p: Professor | no (p.enrolled & p.teaches)
        all p,q: Professor | no (q.enrolled & p.teaches)
        all c: Course | c.grades.Grade in Student
        -- Main requirement (forces unsat with the instance above):
        all s: Student, c: Course | s in c.grades.Grade implies c in s.enrolled
    }
} for 3 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj P1,P2,P3 : Person | some disj C1,C2 : Course | some disj PR1,PR2 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        -- Universe
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2 + P3
        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = PR1 + PR2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        -- Relations
        teaches = P1->C1 + P1->C2
        enrolled = P2->C1 + P3->C2
        Person <: projects = P2->PR1 + P3->PR2
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1 + C2->PR2
        Course <: grades = C1->P2->G1 + C2->P2->G2  -- P2 graded in C2 without enrollment (violation)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2

        -- Requirements:
        all p: Person | some p.enrolled implies p in Student
        all p: Person | some p.teaches implies p in Professor
        all c: Course | some teaches.c
        all pr: Project | one (Course <: projects).pr
        all p: Person | some p.(Person <: projects) implies p in Student
        all pr: Project | some (Person <: projects).pr
        all s: Student, pr: Project | (s->pr in (Person <: projects)) implies (some c: Course | c->pr in (Course <: projects) and s->c in enrolled)
        all s: Student, c: Course | lone ( s.(Person <: projects) & c.(Course <: projects) )
        all p: Professor | no (p.enrolled & p.teaches)
        all p,q: Professor | no (q.enrolled & p.teaches)
        all c: Course | c.grades.Grade in Student
        -- Main requirement (forces unsat with the instance above):
        all s: Student, c: Course | s in c.grades.Grade implies c in s.enrolled
    }
} for 3 Person, 2 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg3 {
    some disj P1,P2,P3,P4 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj PR1,PR2 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        -- Universe
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3 + P4
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2 + P3 + P4
        Course = C1
        Project = PR1 + PR2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        -- Relations
        teaches = P1->C1
        enrolled = P2->C1 + P4->C1
        Person <: projects = P2->PR1 + P4->PR2
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1 + C1->PR2
        Course <: grades = C1->P3->G2   -- P3 graded in C1 without enrollment (violation)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2

        -- Requirements:
        all p: Person | some p.enrolled implies p in Student
        all p: Person | some p.teaches implies p in Professor
        all c: Course | some teaches.c
        all pr: Project | one (Course <: projects).pr
        all p: Person | some p.(Person <: projects) implies p in Student
        all pr: Project | some (Person <: projects).pr
        all s: Student, pr: Project | (s->pr in (Person <: projects)) implies (some c: Course | c->pr in (Course <: projects) and s->c in enrolled)
        all s: Student, c: Course | lone ( s.(Person <: projects) & c.(Course <: projects) )
        all p: Professor | no (p.enrolled & p.teaches)
        all p,q: Professor | no (q.enrolled & p.teaches)
        all c: Course | c.grades.Grade in Student
        -- Main requirement (forces unsat with the instance above):
        all s: Student, c: Course | s in c.grades.Grade implies c in s.enrolled
    }
} for 4 Person, 1 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Pos1 {
  some disj Prof1, Stud1, Stud2 : Person |
  some disj C1 : Course |
  some disj P1 : Project |
  some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Stud1 + Stud2
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = Stud1 + Stud2
    Course = C1
    Project = P1
    Grade = G1 + G2

    teaches = Prof1->C1
    enrolled = Stud1->C1 + Stud2->C1
    Person <: projects = Stud1->P1 + Stud2->P1
    Course <: projects = C1->P1
    Course <: grades = C1->Stud1->G2
    Grade <: next = G1->G2
  }
} for 3 Person, 1 Professor, 2 Student, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Pos2 {
  some disj Prof1, Stud1, Stud2, Stud3 : Person |
  some disj C1, C2 : Course |
  some disj P1, P2 : Project |
  some disj G1, G2, G3 : Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Stud1 + Stud2 + Stud3
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = Stud1 + Stud2 + Stud3
    Course = C1 + C2
    Project = P1 + P2
    Grade = G1 + G2 + G3

    teaches = Prof1->C1 + Prof1->C2
    enrolled = Stud1->C1 + Stud2->C1 + Stud2->C2 + Stud3->C2
    Person <: projects = Stud1->P1 + Stud2->P1 + Stud2->P2 + Stud3->P2
    Course <: projects = C1->P1 + C2->P2
    Course <: grades = C1->Stud1->G3 + C1->Stud2->G2 + C2->Stud3->G3 + C2->Stud2->G1
    Grade <: next = G1->G2 + G2->G3
  }
} for 4 Person, 1 Professor, 3 Student, 2 Course, 2 Project, 3 Grade expect 1

run Pos3 {
  some disj Prof1, Prof2, Stud1, Stud2 : Person |
  some disj C1, C2 : Course |
  some disj P1, P2 : Project |
  some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Prof2 + Stud1 + Stud2
    Professor = Prof1 + Prof2
    Student = Stud1 + Stud2
    Course = C1 + C2
    Project = P1 + P2
    Grade = G1 + G2

    teaches = Prof1->C1 + Prof2->C2
    enrolled = Stud1->C1 + Stud2->C2
    Person <: projects = Stud1->P1 + Stud2->P2
    Course <: projects = C1->P1 + C2->P2
    Course <: grades = C1->Stud1->G2 + C2->Stud2->G2
    Grade <: next = G1->G2
  }
} for 4 Person, 2 Professor, 2 Student, 2 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Neg1 {
  some disj Prof1, Stud1, Stud2 : Person |
  some disj C1, C2 : Course |
  some disj P1, P2 : Project |
  some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Stud1 + Stud2
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = Stud1 + Stud2
    Course = C1 + C2
    Project = P1 + P2
    Grade = G1 + G2

    teaches = Prof1->C1 + Prof1->C2
    enrolled = Stud1->C1 + Stud1->C2 + Stud2->C1 + Stud2->C2
    Person <: projects = Stud1->P1 + Stud2->P1 + Stud1->P2 + Stud2->P2
    Course <: projects = C1->P1 + C2->P2
    Course <: grades = C1->Stud1->G2 + C2->Stud2->G2
    Grade <: next = G1->G2
  }
} for 3 Person, 1 Professor, 2 Student, 2 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
  some disj Prof1, Prof2, Stud1, Stud2, Stud3 : Person |
  some disj C1, C2 : Course |
  some disj P1, P2 : Project |
  some disj G1, G2, G3 : Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Prof2 + Stud1 + Stud2 + Stud3
    Professor = Prof1 + Prof2
    Student = Stud1 + Stud2 + Stud3
    Course = C1 + C2
    Project = P1 + P2
    Grade = G1 + G2 + G3

    teaches = Prof1->C1 + Prof2->C2
    enrolled = Stud1->C1 + Stud1->C2 + Stud2->C1 + Stud2->C2 + Stud3->C2
    Person <: projects = Stud1->P1 + Stud2->P1 + Stud1->P2 + Stud2->P2 + Stud3->P2
    Course <: projects = C1->P1 + C2->P2
    Course <: grades = C1->Stud2->G3 + C1->Stud1->G2 + C2->Stud3->G3 + C2->Stud1->G2
    Grade <: next = G1->G2 + G2->G3
  }
} for 5 Person, 2 Professor, 3 Student, 2 Course, 2 Project, 3 Grade expect 0

run Neg3 {
  some disj Prof1, Stud1, Stud2 : Person |
  some disj C1, C2, C3 : Course |
  some disj P1, P2, P3 : Project |
  some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Stud1 + Stud2
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = Stud1 + Stud2
    Course = C1 + C2 + C3
    Project = P1 + P2 + P3
    Grade = G1 + G2

    teaches = Prof1->C1 + Prof1->C2 + Prof1->C3
    enrolled = Stud1->C1 + Stud1->C2 + Stud1->C3 + Stud2->C1 + Stud2->C2
    Person <: projects = Stud1->P1 + Stud2->P1 + Stud1->P2 + Stud2->P2 + Stud1->P3
    Course <: projects = C1->P1 + C2->P2 + C3->P3
    Course <: grades = C1->Stud1->G2
    Grade <: next = G1->G2
  }
} for 3 Person, 1 Professor, 2 Student, 3 Course, 3 Project, 2 Grade expect 0
